dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare tread upon the domain of the Inferno Serpent?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking knowledge and understanding.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge and understanding? Such quaint desires from a feeble being.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I mean no harm, I only wish to learn and gain wisdom from your kind.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom you seek, but wisdom comes with a price. What can you offer in return?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer my loyalty and service to you, mighty Inferno Serpent.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Loyalty is a rare commodity. You may prove useful. I shall consider your offer.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have nothing to offer but my curiosity. I will leave if you wish.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity killed the cat, they say. Leave, and do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If knowledge has a price, then name it. I am willing to pay.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The price is steep, mortal. Are you truly prepared to pay it?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will pay whatever price you demand, O Inferno Serpent.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words for a fragile being. Very well, we shall strike a deal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I must reconsider. I shall leave now and return another time.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you wish. Depart, and do not test my patience again.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come not seeking knowledge but seeking power. Share your strength with me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power you seek, power you may find. But power can be a double-edged sword.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am willing to take the risks. Grant me your power, mighty Inferno Serpent.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold of you to gamble with the flames of power. I shall grant your request.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The risks are too great for me. I shall withdraw my request.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice, mortal. Power is not for the weak-willed. Leave now.
